name: Adbs

aliases.name: Miti
aliases.comment: Represent BS Date types in Miti format.
aliases.type: { year : Int, month : Int, day : Int }

values.name: ad2bs
values.comment: Coverts Date type to a date string in BS calendar format

values.name: bs2ad
values.comment: Coverts date string in the BS calendar format to Date type

values.name: miti
values.comment:
Constructor to create dates of the Miti type

-- create a Miti type for 2047/03/11
miti 2047 03 11 = { year = 2047, month = 3, day = 11 } : Miti
